ygData.subject: Re: Spells In General
ygData.msgSnippet: Myself and another paladin in Freeport were curious about our spells that we can cast. I realize that there are a number of canned spells that we can cast
ygData.messageBody:
Myself and another paladin in Freeport were curious about our spells that we
can cast.

I realize that there are a number of "canned" spells that we can cast that
are purchased at our guild. I have all of these that I am able to cast at
this time. However, are there spells that we can pick up from other
towns/shops etc. that we can cast also? Or are we limited to what we can
purchase from the Guild? I went over to the necromancer's guild and looked
through all of the spells that they were selling and most of them said that
I couldn't use the spell. Just curious about this.

Grod
11th Level Paladin
Innoruuk Server
